forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Rain showers this morning becoming a steady, heavy rain during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds SSE at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers early becoming a steady, drenching rain for the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wind driven heavy rain. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: A wind driven heavy rain. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wind driven heavy rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: A wind driven heavy rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: More clouds than sun. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 10C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low near 50F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
